title: MCD封闭测试结束关闭
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-4-24 19:44 编辑 
Just a heads up that the Minecraft Dungeons closed beta will close on Thursday, April 24 at 11am CEST (2am Pacific)
MCD封闭测试 已经于 北京时间 4月24日周五  下午 17:00  关闭！

replies.author: 一只鸽纸
replies.txt_content: 这次不会延迟关闭了吗

replies.author: 飞翔之歌
replies.txt_content:
